pullRequest.title: Always use new BPM connector - fix executor response.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist:

 Have you added a note in the CHANGELOG wiki for your change if user-facing?
 Have you added unit tests for your change?

nodes.bodyText: you don't need if, you can just return the value of the condition;
BTW there is plan to change it in the future to not always return true?
